reviews.text: Stopped in for dinner and drinks. I got the Buffalo cauliflower wings and they were perfection! I love going somewhere that knows how to make vegetarian...

Fun pub with an above average selection of beer
Nachos or wings pick your poison there both wonderful and compliment the drinks
Service spot on
